item.title: Why can't I post my status image on forums
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Instead of

echo '<img src="online.gif" />';

do this:

header("Content-type: image/gif");
readfile("online.gif");

and the same for offline.

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I post my status image on forums

item.title: Why can't I post my status image on forums
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

I already asked how can I can fix this. Because I’m new with php. So now it works. It show online and offline. But I can’t post like

[img]http://mysite.com/check?ip=blabla&port=blabla[/img]

Then it don’t show the image. because its not in corner of my page. How can I fix that.
THis is it:

<?php $ip= $_GET['ip']; $port= $_GET['port']; $up = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $errno, $errstr, 30); if($up) { echo '<img src="online.gif" />'; } else { echo '<img src="offline.gif" />'; } ?>

Again, I’m new with php so please don’t flame to much

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't I post my status image on forums
